adrFormatAddress: 552 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: I went this Saturday to surprise my husband. When we arrived we were greeted by the host named Jimmy. He was very welcoming and made us feel comfortable. We had a very enjoyable relax time. The women were beautiful. Very clean place and everyone was nice and not pushy. I think this place is great for couples who wants to have a little extra excitement. Thinking about going back soon to enjoy club a little more.

originalText.text: Had the wonderful opportunity to visit this establishment for the first time 10/15/21 from the customer parking to the front door security everyone was highly professional. Once inside we were greeted by the floor manager jimmy excellent personality very warm and friendly. The bartender  ames lucy was an awesome hostess we enjoyed her hospitality. Amazing even when going to freshen up the bathroom staff was courteous and respectful. I felt extremely comfortable at HQ. The grace and professional and beautiful ladies just made the experience over the top. This place is 5 stars all-day highly recommend this for All.

originalText.text: HQ IS TOP NOTCH. BIG JOHN THE OWNER IS AMAZING SUCH A FUN PERSON. Bought us drinks and was so generous. Jimmy Kim thank you for ur hospitality. The girls are so beautiful and friendly. My new hangout spot.

originalText.text: HQ is really top notch. Classy boutique Club the Dancers are beautiful the atmosphere is excellent Jimmy Kim is the best host he makes sure u have a great time This is my new Thursday club I will be here hopefully once a week. Thank u HQ staff

originalText.text:
This place has a great vibe to it. From the front house to the back. All the workers are great and hot, my girlfriends and I had a awesome time for our friends Bach party !!
5 stars for sure
Will be back to celebrate another event coming!
Thanks HQ
